conversations.conversation:
What are the benefits of our ;plant-based plastic products;? The specific technical attributes are the following: easy to compound by extrusion process, high dispersion properties and compatibility with fillers and natural fibers, high flexibility for production of compounds or master batches, high compatibility with polyolefins, and good shock resistance. They also have a low environmental impact: over 52% ;plant-based material;, reduced ;carbon footprint;, conservation of scarce oil resources. Production efficiencies will make these remarkable recyclable plastics favored over the next few years.
;
;For more information: ;;www.gaialene.com;;
